name: Alpha Decay (itch)
description:
Use the wonder of radioactive particle decay in this minimalist puzzle game to create new atomic combinations! 

Our first ever game jam entry! We have a lot more ideas on how to expand on the ideas here, but we're happy with how it turned out.

Thanks for checking it out!

Development by Devon Oberdan

Art by Victoria Ogino

Designed by Devon Oberdan and Victoria Ogino

Music and sounds from freesounds.org
